m_szDocTitle: New York Electric Vehicle Rebate Will Knock $2,000 off MSRP
m_szDocSumamry: Reddit A Nissan Leaf charges on New York City’s Lower East Side | Stan Honda/AFP/Getty Images New York driving is about to get greener. While we were sorting through new electric vehicles and plug-in hybrids  at the New York Auto Show , Gov. Andrew Cuomo and lawmakers were mulling over various proposals for the upcoming state budget in Albany, including a consumer incentive on EV purchases. One week later, the budget passed with a rebate of up to $2,000 when Empire State residents buy a pure EV, plug-in hybrid (PHEV), or fuel cell vehicle.
